alert.note: Alert for Southern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued June 04 at 2:06PM EDT until June 05 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in Southern Baltimore County and the City of Baltimore. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 10 AM EDT Monday, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 3.5 feet, flooding is occurring at the end of Thames Street in Baltimore. Water covers the promenade in the Inner Harbor in multiple locations. At 3.0 feet, water begins encroaching upon yards in the Bowleys Quarters area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides one and a half to two feet above normal. The next high tides at Fort McHenry Baltimore are at 7:45 PM this evening and 8:10 AM Monday morning. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. NW Branch Patapsco River at Baltimore MD MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 5.0 ft, Major 6.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 04/08 PM 2.6 0.9 1.5 0.5 None 05/08 AM 3.8 2.1 1.6 0.5 Minor 05/08 PM 2.3 0.6 1.2 0.5 None 06/09 AM 3.2 1.5 1.1 0.5 None 06/09 PM 2.0 0.3 0.9 0.5 None 07/09 AM 2.4 0.7 0.4 0.5 None Chesapeake Bay at Bowleys Quarters MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 3.8 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.1 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 04/08 PM 2.2 0.5 1.3 0.5 None 05/08 AM 3.4 1.7 1.4 0.5 Minor 05/08 PM 1.9 0.2 1.1 0.5 None 06/09 AM 2.8 1.1 0.8 1.0 None 06/10 PM 1.7 0.0 0.7 0.5 None 07/10 AM 2.2 0.5 0.3 1.0 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
